result.eng: If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.
result.ga: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50
result.orig: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50
result.html: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.
result.ponchtml: Má leanann tú ar aġaiḋ mar sin beiḋ tú marḃ faoi 50If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.

result.eng: He has been dead for a long time.
result.html: Tá sé marbh le fadaHe has been dead for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé marḃ le fadaHe has been dead for a long time.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ga: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.orig: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.html: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ponchtml: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlaċ a ẛaiġdiúirí marḃ anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: A prayer for neighbours who are among the dead.
result.ga: Urnaí le comharsana a bhí ar shlua na marbh
result.orig: Urnaí le comharsana a bhí ar shlua na marbh
result.html: Urnaí le comharsana a bhí ar shlua na marbhA prayer for neighbours who are among the dead.
result.ponchtml: Urnaí le coṁarsana a ḃí ar ẛlua na marḃA prayer for neighbours who are among the dead.

result.eng: They are all among the dead.
result.ga: Tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbh
result.orig: Tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbh
result.html: Tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbhThey are all among the dead.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad uilig ar ẛlua na marḃThey are all among the dead.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: You are out of pain. You are out of your misery. [You are dead.]
result.html: Tá tú as pianaighYou are out of pain. You are out of your misery. [You are dead.]
result.ponchtml: Tá tú as pianaiġYou are out of pain. You are out of your misery. [You are dead.]
